datafield.subfield: Albert Brenner Glickman Family Library (University of Southern Maine)
Glickman Family Library (University of Southern Maine)
NUCMC data from Maine Hist. Soc. for Jean Byers Sampson Center for Diversity in Maine printed material collection, ca. 1996-2001

(Jean Byers Sampson Center for Diversity in Maine located in the Special Collections of the University of Southern Maine Library; collects material documenting the ongoing histories of diverse communities; current collections represent the African American, Jewish, and Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgendered communities; hdg.: University of Southern Maine. Library)
Univ. of Southern Maine WWW, Apr. 26, 2010
(Oct. 1997: Portland Campus Library [no publs. in LC database] dedicated as the Albert Brenner Glickman Family Library; commonly known as Glickman Family Library; home page of Library: USM Libraries)
